TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but your house's new life support system is now busted, quickly killing you and all who currently inhabit the house. Oh, and Earth's atmosphere is now pure methane, so that's probably why your house now needs a life support system

I wish for some M&Ms.

Granted. Upon further inspection you find out they are in fact SKITTLES!

I wish for a N64.

Granted. It catches fire

I wish for a game which lags at 1fps

Granted, as a bonus, it lags at 0 fps

I wish for a pie.

Granted. It is pie flavour witch doesn't have any taste

I wish for nothing

Granted. The universe and everything in it gets sucked into a black hole.

I wish for an xbox one.

Granted, but then your Internet router catches on fire.

I wish that this wish is granted.

Not Granted. I hate you (JK)

I wish for the answer

Granted, but no one knows the question.

I wish the person below me wished that the person below them wished that they exploded.

Granted, but it's edited before anyone can answer.

EDIT: I wish for a wish.

Granted you blow up.

I wish for a muffin as always.

Granted. It's full of live ants.

I wish my laptop hadn't bricked...

Granted. Your laptop is now not a brick, it is a broken laptop.

I wish that this got to page 10,000 before being shut down.

Granted, but the sheer size took up most of the bandwidth and nothing else was useable.

I wish for a thunderstorm

Granted, but lightning strikes you and you are electrocuted...

I wish I had a cup. (Huehue... Try to corrupt this.)

Granted, the cup has no bottom.

I wish for something.

Okey dokey here you go!

I wish for my P-51 Mustang not to keep wiping out in mid-air because of an engine failure ( often leading to facepalm moments ).

Granted, I can't think of a comeback

i wish for a plane that doesn't SRUVD

Granted. It blows up in your face

I wish for KSP 0.21 to come out already

Granted, but its only out for a Developer... Its in Quality Assurance

I wish that this wish be granted. You cant stop me again!
Granted, but it will cost you all of your blood. . I wish that it wasn't so hard to use the KSP forums on mobile

Granted. Now the layout changed on PC so that it seems normal

I wish it wasn't so hot in Canada

Granted, but now its negative sixty degrees.

I wish to have a good nights sleep for once.

Granted. For every night after, you have insomnia.

I wish for some lemonade.

Granted they burn you house down!

I wish for a muffin.
